data.text: @hkfp ON9 7 incompetence soviet breadline, eunuchs calm in a tofu virus cave

@hkfp 1. Hide most of the information. 
2. Never listen to people. 
3. Create chaos by herself

How can people be calm? We are protecting ourselves from your ridiculous policies!
@hkfp Hkers understand well what she means by calm. Everyone doing what a sensible person would do
@hkfp Unfortunately this is what you get when you goose step in line with the CCP masters.

@hkfp also Carrie lam and her team: all options are on the table including asking you to queue outside for hours for testing while applying a citywide lockdown. she has lost all her credibility at this point.
@hkfp Giving uncertain info makes people to panic and get paranoid....so how could u tell them to calm down....😮😮😮
@hkfp Because you never present a clear plan and stick to it, maybe it is 7 days, maybe 7 weeks. Leaving 7 million people in the dark what will happen and surprised to see chaos.
@hkfp The panic is caused by the inconsistency of messages from within the government. How dare you ask people to calm down?
